thread.title: Colangelo: Ben Simmons Will Sit Out The Rest Of The Year
thread.title_full: Colangelo: Ben Simmons Will Sit Out The Rest Of The Year

author: CBS Philly
title: Colangelo: Ben Simmons Will Sit Out The Rest Of The Year
text:
— John Barchard (@JohnBarchard) February 24, 2017 
Simmons’ CT scan showed his injury has not fully healed, according to Colangelo. Update: CT scan showed a fracture but unclear as to whether it’s new or old #Sixers https://t.co/bxRDu9sMIh 
— John Barchard (@JohnBarchard) February 24, 2017 
Given the limited amount of time left in the season, Colangelo said a decision has been made to sit Simmons the remainder of the year. 
He says they are in talks to try and get him into a summer league.
